Literature.Title: Encrypted Antimicrobial Peptides from Plant Proteins.
Literature.Author: Ramada MHS, Brand GD, Abrão FY, Oliveira M, Filho JLC, Galbieri R, Gramacho KP, Prates MV, Bloch C Jr

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=1-32 µM,Human erythrocytes:1.27±0.44% Hemolysis=64 µM,Human erythrocytes:3.41±0.84% Hemolysis=128 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=32.0µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MFC=32.0±0.0µM),Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC 28957(MIC=32.0µM),Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC 28957(MFC=32.0±0.0µM),Fusarium solani(MIC=8.0µM),Fusarium solani(no activity data),Fusarium oxysporum(MIC=16.0µM),Fusarium oxysporum(no activity data),Fusarium oxysporum f.sp. vasinfectum(MIC=13.33±4.61µM),Fusarium oxysporum f.sp. vasinfectum(MFC=128.0±0.0µM),Ramulariopsis gossypii(MIC=16.0µM),Ramulariopsis gossypii(MFC=32.0±0.0µM),Rhizoctonia solani(MIC=32.0µM),Rhizoctonia solani(no activity data),Trichoderma asperellum(MIC=8.0µM),Trichoderma asperellum(no activity data),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8.0µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=16.0±0.0µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(no activity data),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=3.33±1.15µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MBC=4.0±0.0µM),Bacillus cereus ATCC 14579(MIC=64.0µM),Bacillus cereus ATCC 14579(MBC=128.0±0.0µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=8.0µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MBC=16.0±0.0µM),Pectobacterium carotovorum(MIC=32.0µM),Pectobacterium carotovorum(MBC=64.0±0.0µM),Pseudomonas syringae pv. tabaci(MIC=4.0µM),Pseudomonas syringae pv. tabaci(MBC=128.0±0.0µM),Xanthomonas campestris pv. citri(MIC=32.0µM),Xanthomonas campestris pv. citri(MBC=64.0±0.0µM)
